    u_mid = (u_dom[0]+u_dom[1])/2

code:
import Rhino.Geometry as rg
import Rhino

go = Rhino.Input.Custom.GetObject()
go.SetCommandPrompt("Select surface")
go.GeometryFilter = Rhino.DocObjects.ObjectType.Surface
go.Get()
if go.CommandResult() == Rhino.Commands.Result.Success:
    face = go.Object(0).Face()
    u_dom = face.Domain(0)
    v_dom = face.Domain(1)
    u_mid = (u_dom.Min + u_dom.Max) / 2.0
    v_mid = (v_dom.Min + v_dom.Max) / 2.0
    normal = face.NormalAt(u_mid, v_mid)
    print("Normal:", normal)

import Rhino
import scriptcontext as sc

layer_index = sc.doc.Layers.FindByFullPath("Default", -1)
if layer_index >= 0:
    settings = Rhino.DocObjects.ObjectEnumeratorSettings()
    settings.LayerIndexFilter = layer_index
    objs = sc.doc.Objects.GetObjectList(settings)
    for obj in objs:
        sc.doc.Objects.Delete(obj, True)
    sc.doc.Views.Redraw()

code:
import Rhino.Geometry as rg
import scriptcontext as sc

plane1 = rg.Plane(rg.Point3d(0,0,0), rg.Vector3d(0,0,1))
circle1 = rg.Circle(plane1, 10).ToNurbsCurve()
plane2 = rg.Plane(rg.Point3d(0,0,15), rg.Vector3d(0,0,1))
circle2 = rg.Circle(plane2, 3).ToNurbsCurve()
breps = rg.Brep.CreateFromLoft([circle1, circle2], rg.Point3d.Unset, rg.Point3d.Unset, rg.LoftType.Normal, False)
if breps:
    for b in breps:
        sc.doc.Objects.AddBrep(b)
    sc.doc.Views.Redraw()
